content.en:
Description

This project explores the issue of reusing data collected in qualitative research. The project's starting point begins with the recognition that the reuse of qualitative researches requires much more than mere access to online data.

Context

Nowadays secondary analysis of data  collected through qualitative surveys is highly problematic.

Objectives

To develop a BD-quali platform that will offer: A guided introduction to each of the data sets of the published research (‘research on the research’); An interface to navigate through the datascape encouraging serendipitous discovery of data. This exploration aims to expose the value of the data without requiring the user to go through all the contents of the research. - Project coordinator: Sophie Duchesne - Call for Project:
content.fr:
Description

This project explores the issue of reusing data collected in qualitative research. The project's starting point begins with the recognition that the reuse of qualitative researches requires much more that just having access to online data.

Context

Nowadays secondary analysis of data that are collected through qualitative surveys is highly problematic.

Objectifs

To develop a BD-quali platform that will offer: A guided introduction to each of the data sets of the published research (‘research on the research’); An interface to navigate through the datascape encouraging serendipitous discovery of data. This exploration aims to expose the value of the data without requiring the user to go through all the contents of the research. - Project coordinator: Sophie Duchesne - Call for Project:
